text:
After downloading the required dependencies for Apache2.2.31 and performing an rpm build on Suse linux platform (SLE_11_SP3), encountered the following error:

/usr/lib64/apr/build-1/libtool --silent --mode=compile gcc -pthread    -DLINUX -D_REENTRANT -D_GNU_SOURCE    -I. -I/usr/src/packages/BUILD/httpd-2.2.31/prefork/include -I/usr/src/packages/BUILD/httpd-2.2.31/os/unix -I/usr/src/packages/BUILD/httpd-2.2.31/server/mpm/prefork -I/usr/src/packages/BUILD/httpd-2.2.31/modules/http -I/usr/src/packages/BUILD/httpd-2.2.31/modules/filters -I/usr/src/packages/BUILD/httpd-2.2.31/modules/proxy -I/usr/src/packages/BUILD/httpd-2.2.31/include -I/usr/src/packages/BUILD/httpd-2.2.31/modules/generators -I/usr/src/packages/BUILD/httpd-2.2.31/modules/mappers -I/usr/src/packages/BUILD/httpd-2.2.31/modules/database -I/usr/include/apr-1 -I/usr/include -I/usr/local/include -I/usr/src/packages/BUILD/httpd-2.2.31/prefork/server -I/usr/src/packages/BUILD/httpd-2.2.31/modules/proxy/../generators -I/usr/src/packages/BUILD/httpd-2.2.31/modules/ssl -I/usr/src/packages/BUILD/httpd-2.2.31/modules/dav/main -prefer-pic -c /usr/src/packages/BUILD/httpd-2.2.31/modules/mappers/mod_rewrite.c && touch mod_rewrite.slo
/usr/lib64/apr/build-1/libtool --silent --mode=link gcc -pthread    -L/usr/local/lib      -o mod_vhost_alias.la -rpath /usr/lib64/httpd/modules -module -avoid-version  mod_vhost_alias.lo
/usr/lib64/apr/build-1/libtool --silent --mode=link gcc -pthread    -L/usr/local/lib      -o mod_negotiation.la -rpath /usr/lib64/httpd/modules -module -avoid-version  mod_negotiation.lo
/usr/lib64/apr/build-1/libtool --silent --mode=link gcc -pthread    -L/usr/local/lib      -o mod_dir.la -rpath /usr/lib64/httpd/modules -module -avoid-version  mod_dir.lo
/usr/lib64/apr/build-1/libtool --silent --mode=link gcc -pthread    -L/usr/local/lib      -o mod_actions.la -rpath /usr/lib64/httpd/modules -module -avoid-version  mod_actions.lo
/usr/lib64/apr/build-1/libtool --silent --mode=link gcc -pthread    -L/usr/local/lib      -o mod_speling.la -rpath /usr/lib64/httpd/modules -module -avoid-version  mod_speling.lo
/usr/lib64/apr/build-1/libtool --silent --mode=link gcc -pthread    -L/usr/local/lib      -o mod_userdir.la -rpath /usr/lib64/httpd/modules -module -avoid-version  mod_userdir.lo
/usr/lib64/apr/build-1/libtool --silent --mode=link gcc -pthread    -L/usr/local/lib      -o mod_alias.la -rpath /usr/lib64/httpd/modules -module -avoid-version  mod_alias.lo
/usr/lib64/apr/build-1/libtool --silent --mode=link gcc -pthread    -L/usr/local/lib      -o mod_rewrite.la -rpath /usr/lib64/httpd/modules -module -avoid-version  mod_rewrite.lo
make[4]: Leaving directory `/usr/src/packages/BUILD/httpd-2.2.31/prefork/modules/mappers'
make[3]: Leaving directory `/usr/src/packages/BUILD/httpd-2.2.31/prefork/modules/mappers'
make[2]: Leaving directory `/usr/src/packages/BUILD/httpd-2.2.31/prefork/modules'
make[2]: Entering directory `/usr/src/packages/BUILD/httpd-2.2.31/prefork/support'
make[2]: Leaving directory `/usr/src/packages/BUILD/httpd-2.2.31/prefork/support'

make[1]: Leaving directory `/usr/src/packages/BUILD/httpd-2.2.31/prefork'
make: *** [all-recursive] Error 1
error: Bad exit status from /var/tmp/rpm-tmp.69362 (%build)


RPM build errors:
    Bad exit status from /var/tmp/rpm-tmp.69362 (%build)
D: May free Score board((nil))




I happen to see similair error message reported couple of years back, may be this time it is occuring due to some other reason. Any help here is much appreciated.

Bug 53162 - Cannot compile Apache 2.2.22


Thanks & Regards,
Naresh.
creator: naresh_ankuskani@yahoo.co.in

text:
Hi! httpd 2.2.x is EOL and not supported anymore, I am inclined to close this task as won't fix. Please re-open if you encounter the same issue with 2.4.x

Thanks!
creator: toscano.luca@gmail.com
